comment: There was no application fee to apply for DACA status. So who picked up the $317 million tab? Legal immigrants. To add insult to injury, these legal immigrants also had to wait longer for their applications, since the DACA recipients jumped them in line.
amr:
# ::snt There was no application fee to apply for DACA status. So who picked up the $317 million tab? Legal immigrants. To add insult to injury, these legal immigrants also had to wait longer for their applications, since the DACA recipients jumped them in line.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / fee
            :polarity -
            :purpose (a / apply-01
                  :ARG1 (s / status
                        :mod (p / program
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "DACA")))))
      :snt2 (p2 / pick-up-11
            :ARG0 (a2 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (t / tab
                  :mod (m2 / monetary-quantity
                        :quant317000000 (d / dollar))))
      :snt3 (p3 / person
            :ARG0-of (ii / immigrate-01)
            :mod (l / law)
            :mod (t2 / this))
      :snt4 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (ii2 / immigrate-01)
                  :mod (l2 / law)
                  :mod t2))
      :ARG2 (w / wait-01
            :ARG1 p4
            :ARG2 (a3 / apply-01
                  :ARG0 p4)
            :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (l3 / long-03
                        :ARG1 w)
                  :ARG3 (m3 / more)))
      :mod (a4 / also)
      :ARG0-of (a5 / add-02
            :ARG1 (ii3 / insult-01
                  :ARG0 (j / jump-03
                        :ARG0 (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (r / receive-01
                                    :ARG1 (l4 / law
                                          :name n
                                          :op1 "DACA"))))
                  :ARG1 p4))
      :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG1 (ii4 / injure-01)))

comment: Using a derogatory word to describe someone's race is not productive in conversion and does not show care.
amr:

(a / and
      :op1 (p / productive-03
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :mod (d / derogatory))
                  :ARG2 (d2 / describe-01
                        :ARG1 (r / race
                              :poss (s / someone))))
            :ARG1 (c / convert-01))
      :op2 (s2 / show-01
